description: Create a new DNS Server configuration for a NAS Server. Only one object can be created per NAS Server.

domain.description: Name of the DNS domain, where the NAS Server does host names lookup when an FQDN is not specified in the request.

ip_addresses.description: The list of DNS server IP addresses. The addresses may be IPv4 or IPv6.

nas_server_id.description: Unique identifier of the associated NAS Server instance that uses this DNS object. Only one DNS object per NAS Server is supported.

transport.description: Transport used when connecting to the DNS Server:* UDP - DNS uses the UDP protocol (default)* TCP - DNS uses the TCP protocol
